column2: # Here we use the function lapply to standardize each dataset (gene-wise) using the rowNorm function from the PLIER package.
x[["GEX_norm"]] = PLIER::rowNorm(x[["GEX"]]) #standarization of each data set (gene wise)

meta_targets = meta_targets %>% mutate(Tech = case_when(ExpID == "Hsu_2018" | ExpID == "Thomas_2019" | ExpID == "Sun_2021" | ExpID == "Herrera_Rivero_2022" | ExpID == "Santos_2020" | ExpID == "Zhu_2020"  ~ "RNA-Seq", TRUE ~ "microarray"))
